Title: Rabble-Rowza
Intro: A Rabble-Rowza is armed with a Moon-sickle and Basha.

Rules.Name: Mushroom-Stuffed Bat Squigs
Rules.Fluff: Rabble-Rowzas are surrounded by flocks of rabid Bat Squigs, fed on a diet of volatile fungus and eager to dive-bomb enemies in explosive fashion.
Rules.Rule: Mushroom-stuffed Bat Squigs: Once per battle, in your shooting phase, you can say that this unit will deploy its Bat Squigs. If you do so, pick 3 different enemy units within 12" of this unit. Each of those enemy units suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Squig-Skull Armour
Rules.Fluff: Encased in the massive skull of a squig, the Rabble-Rowza is able to hunker down and take shelter from attacks.
Rules.Rule: Squig-skull Armour: This unit has a ward of 4+ while it is more than 6" from all enemy units.
